content:
The total fighting loss of the enemy from 24.02.22 to 29.03.24 are approximately:

  • personnel - -440 790 (+820) persons liquidated
  • tanks -6922 (+8)
  • combat armored vehicles -13264 (+27)
  • Artillery systems -10991 (+28)
  • RSZV -1023 (+2)
  • air defense means -735 (+6)
  • aircraft -347 (0)
  • Helicopters -325 (0)
  • UAV of the operative-tactical level-8656 (+56)
  • Winged rockets -2022 (+5)
  • ships / boats -26 (0)
  • submarines -1 (0)
  • Automobile equipment and tanks -14645 (+50)
  • Special technique -1807 (+7)

The data is specified ...

Beat the occupier! Let's win together! Our strength is in truth!

Source:The General Staff of the Armed Forces of UkraineAs of 29.03.24.
title: Russia's losses in the war exceeded 440 thousand people - the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine
author: Army Inform
